extendedInfo.description: Carry the bank in your pocket with the CIMB Clicks App.Banking transactions made easy with the CIMB Clicks App, providing not only with easy-to-use interface, but also the convenience of managing your accounts, anytime and anywhere. Enjoy the convenience of instant access to these handy tools from the palm of your hand: CIMB Clicks#Account Balance enquiry#View transaction history#Fund transfer#Bill Payments#Prepaid Reloads#Fixed Deposit placement#Transaction Scheduling#Gold Investment Account via CIMB Clicks- Buy and sell gold (through your current/savings account) any time from 8:30am to 11:30pm, 7 days a week (except for Malaysia National Public Holiday)-Track your daily gold value online, in real time-Buy/sell gold via Schedule Transaction-Determine profits with our online calculatorNote: You can only perform transactions on your Favourite account with CIMB Clicks TAC on Mobile Instantly generate TAC via your phone by activating âTAC on Mobileâ now and you will no longer need to wait for TAC via SMS! CIMB Clicks Currency ConverterA handy conversion tool with the latest conversion rates. CIMB Clicks Home Loan CalculatorGives a quick evaluation of eligibility for loans and help estimate the monthly installment required. CIMB ClicksA shortcut to your favorite financial portal. CIMB Contact UsContact or email our Call Centre conveniently from your phone. CIMB ATM & Branch LocatorLocate your nearest CIMB Bank ATM or branches whilst on the go. Note: This application is available for CIMB Bank Malaysia account holders only.About CIMB Bank CIMB Bank is the commercial banking arm of CIMB Group offering retail banking services to over 7 million customers on a dual banking platform in 325 branches nationwide. CIMB Group is Malaysiaâs second largest financial services provider and one of Southeast Asiaâs leading universal banking groups. It offers consumer banking, investment banking, Islamic banking, asset management and insurance products and services. Headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, its key operations are located in Malaysia, Indonesia, Singapore and Thailand. The Group also has presence in Brunei, Cambodia, Myanmar and Vietnam. Beyond ASEAN, the Group has offices in India, Hong Kong, Bahrain, London and New York, as well as a 19.99% stake in Bank of Yingkou, China. CIMB Group operates its business through three main brand entities, CIMB Bank, CIMB Investment Bank and CIMB Islamic. CIMB Group is also the majority shareholder of Bank CIMB Niaga in Indonesia, and the single largest shareholder of CIMB Thai in Thailand. CIMB Group is listed on Bursa Malaysia via CIMB Group Holdings Berhad. It has a market capitalisation of approximately RM60.9 billion as at 31 March 2011. The Group has over 38,000 employees located in 13 countries.
